title: Blue Chip Bride
description: RISKY BUSINESS Janet Demarest knew firsthand that not all marriages sprang from storybook romances. But marriage as a business arrangement? She had only to think of her late husband's near-bankrupt estate and her stepson's welfare to accept. The deal seemed Janet owned an interest in Radnor Corporation. The Radnors needed a year to buy her out. To keep everything in the family, Janet would marry Ken Radnor. In a year, Janet would get her money, the family would get a controlling interest, and the couple would get an annulment. The "partners," however, never anticipated the steamy passion that would jeopardize their in-name-only marriage-or that the real commodity they could offer each other was love!
author: Audra Adams
